channel.title: [PS3] Motorstorm isn't 1080p
channel.description: http://www.1up.com/do/newsStory?cId=3156337 -- Whats with Sony? If I remember, Ken Kutagari said all games would be 1080p capable at E3 2005. Seems like they're playing a "It can, but we won't".

item.title: [PS3] Motorstorm isn't 1080p
item.dc:creator: @DeadBird DeadBird
item.description:
@DeadBird wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:7, topic:48403”]You fail to mention how Sony never promise in anyway that these would happen. It’s like designing a MMORPG. Some things have to go because they would suite the game better, or are just too inefficient to be used.

Your an OxBox fan boy, who wants to find any reason to pick on PS3…Out of…erm…jealousy :P[/quote]
Sony’s E3 2005: http://youtube.com/watch?v=7Wzmf0ChL24
I wouldn’t pick on Sony\PS3 if they didn’t spew bullshit.
I assume by saying OxBox you taking a jab at the size of it, well, hold a 360 and then hold a PS3. Ending my post, Xbox fanboys are called Xbots, and I’m not a fanboy. I loved my PS1 and PS2(s).

Read full topic

item.title: [PS3] Motorstorm isn't 1080p
item.dc:creator: @DeadBird DeadBird
item.description:
@DeadBird wrote:

Bang Train:

ill play with my wii thank you very much

Wii can’t do either HD defs
But Nintendo didn’t shit out lies for what it could do. They didn’t mention HD defs at all.
Sony’s list:
7 wireless bluetooth controllers: Axed.
All games in 1080p: Axed.
WiFi standard: Axed.
3 ethernet ports: Stupid but also axed.
2 HDMI ports: Also stupid, and also axed.
All I can remember so far, I’ll watch the E3 video and compare it to current PS3 later.

Read full topic

item.title: [PS3] Motorstorm isn't 1080p
item.dc:creator: @DeadBird DeadBird
item.description:
@DeadBird wrote:

ilyaostr9:

Oh wow, poor you, it’s not like there’s a significant difference between 30 and 60 fps. And 720p and 1080p HD

There actually is a difference though. My parents have a 1080p 64" (?, 62" if not 64") TV. I used to watch DVD’s on it with my PS2 that goes at 480i, but a few months ago they got an upscaling DVD player, the DVDs looked 5000x better.

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:3, topic:48403”]Omfg, well that’s ruined my day…

/wrists[/quote]
I bet it has. 4 months back Sony fanboys were raving on how their 1080p games would be so much better than the 360’s 720p\upscaled 1080p.

Read full topic
